thread.title: Kids Say The Worst Things About LA & NY In The Cutest Way
thread.title_full: Kids Say The Worst Things About LA & NY In The Cutest Way

author: Bill Bradley
title: Kids Say The Worst Things About LA & NY In The Cutest Way
text:
Kids Say The Worst Things About LA & NY In The Cutest Way It's totally terrible but also hilarious. Bill Bradley Entertainment Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/20/2015 11:06 AM EDT 
Ah, children. Whitney Houston believed they are our future, but don't forget they're also the reason you learn all the terrible things your name rhymes with in school. 
Jimmy Kimmel harnessed both the adorable and blunt sides of kids in his latest edition of " LA vs. New York ." Kimmel's camera crew asked kids from each city what they thought of people from the other city, and the results are predictably hilarious. 
According to the kids, LA residents are really into plastic surgery and think there's too much gluten in the world, while New Yorkers are "crazy" and Donald Trump lives there. 
It's all totally offensive in the most adorable way ever. One kid even names Kim Kardashian as the dumbest person in LA, but the way he says it would probably even make Kim say, "Awww." 
"Jimmy Kimmel Live" airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. ET on ABC.
